title: [1.7.2~1.8.9][HAYO Studio]Moon Mod——月之维度！单纯的月球模组！【小白新人汉化】
author: NeverC
txt_content:
-前言-
新人发帖，大家多多支持Thx~I love U~
这个Mod叫Moon MOD，我就给它译为月之维度吧（谁叫这个MOD就一个是只加入月球呢2333333333333）
这个Mod只是单纯加入月球和一些月球物品，就好像星系MOD独立出来的2333333~



：哔哔哔哔哔哔~呼叫航天探险号α！
：这里是α号，我们已经登上月球完毕！

：那么注意安全，这将是我们的第一次巨大飞跃！！！



：没时间磨蹭了，我得快点，氧气快不足了！！！

：我们需要氧气。。。。氧。。。。！

：呼叫α号，听到请回答！（3，2，1.。。。）派遣β号救援机前去营救！无论如何都得找回来！

此时的你为A国航天公司服务，乘坐β号前往月球。。。。


-月球介绍-
利用火箭来到月球

穿上太空服装，准备进行未知世界的探索！


啊，在风化层发现不明橙色池子


再接着走，天哪，这是？奶酪块吗？月球怎么会这样？


月光人！(PS:用奶酪可以驯服他们，其实用处和狗一样）


月球真是奇妙啊，让我们接着往前走吧！！！


制作表

铝块


铝锭


强化镀铝板


强化型羊毛纤维块


红石纤维块


密致纤维层


奶酪块




芝士


登月引擎（核心）


月球帐篷


月光灯


氧气瓶（容器）


制氧核心


氧气填充仪（填充氧气瓶）


气压机


生物容器


储存卡


迷你增压器


航空头盔


太空衣


航空裤衩（2333333333）


太空靴


EVA背包


重力靴




-更新日志-
原文
* Version 1.2 Released: July 1, 2016 *

-This mod is now for Minecraft 1.8.9.-A new material, lunalight. It looks just like Nether quartz except it is light blue. It can also be crafted into blocks and back into items just like Nether quartz.-Memory Card: Used to set the landing coordinates of a rocket. You can set the memory card's coordinates by right clicking on a block at the coordinates you want.-EVA Pack: A new space chestplate that can be fueled by pressing shift while holding gunpowder, and then flown by pressing shift while you are not holding gunpowder.-Gravity Boots: New space boots that allow you to experience Earth gravity while you are on the Moon.-New things like to find underground like the new "Moonshrooms" and a new mob, "Lunalight Bugs" that hatch from their sponge-like nest blocks.-Please note that I could not get the air tank filler's GUI to work, so now you have to right click on an air tank filler with the air tank that you want to fill.-Many small changes and improvements.


* Version 1.1.5 Released: September 9, 2015 *
-Mob Container: Used to store mobs and place them later. They are VERY useful because you can use them to bring mobs to and from the moon AND anywhere else you can go. -You need to build the entire rocket to use the rocket core now.-Rockets now need 10 gunpowder instead of 20.-Moon crawlers are now tamable and behave like wolves.-meteorite blocks, aluminum and cheese can now be found in dungeon and village chests.-Mycelium can now be found deep under ground in caves extremely rarely, it will probably be way more common or replaced by something better in version 1.2.-Many small improvements.
* Version 1.1 Released: August 10, 2015 *
-Full compatibility with Minecraft 1.7.10.-Air Generator: Is required in the use of air tank fillers and can be used to load pressure creators.-Pressure Creator: For filling closed spaces with breathable air. Can be loaded using a full air tank or air generator and activated with a redstone signal.-Redstone Wool: It does not have a use yet. It does make a fizz sound when activated by a redstone signal though.-A GUI/inventory for rocket cores so you can insert gunpowder as fuel and have 4 other slots for storage. All contents of the rocket core's inventory stay in the rocket core's inventory when it travels to the Moon or back.-Underground improvements by removing default underground world generation and using my own underground world generation. I also made orange regolith only generate on the surface and added an interesting surprise deep underground... -Meteors now spawn naturally when the world's difficulty is set to hard thanks to a new technical entity and can now be tiny or large.-Moon crawlers now have moving joints.-Many small improvements.
* Version 1.0 Released: May 29, 2015 *
-The Moon: The dimension added by this mod.-Craters: Big dents in the ground that can be found on the surface of the Moon.-Regolith: That covers found on the surface of the Moon and rare orange regolith that can be used to craft moon lamps.-Aluminum Ore: You can smelt into aluminum ingots that you can use to craft many things.-Meteorite: The kind of block meteorites made by the meteor item are made of.-Moon Egg: Currently a block that can be found inside meteorites made by the meteor item. Spawns a moon crawler when broken. -Reinforced Wool and Aluminum Plated Wood Planks: For building bases on the Moon.-Block of Cheese: You can find on the Moon and craft into cheese slices. -Moon Lamp: Can be used as a light source other than torches or glowstone.-Air Tank Filler: For filling empty air tanks.-Rocket Core: For creating a rocket and going to the Moon.-Moon Tent: Currently does not do anything but will in a future version.-Space Armor: For surviving on the surface of the Moon.-Meteors: You can throw to create a large meteorite. Can only be obtained in creative mode.-Moon Crawlers: Small blue alien creatures that can be found underground on the Moon. In the original moon mod, they were called "Moon UFOs".

简单翻译
1.2版本（16年7月1日）
MOD已支持1.8.9版本啦~添加了新的材料：太空石英！是的他们几乎和原版一样==
存储卡：设置着陆坐标（右键Use）
重力靴：能让你在地球上一样棒的重力~
EVA背包：按shift来飞行的神奇背包（需要以火药为燃料）和一些细节
比如用右键氧气填充仪来填充氧气
1.15版本（15年9月9日）
生物容器：可以用来存储生物在里面，以便于带到月球或者从月球带回来~
现在需要完整的火箭！才能用引擎
火箭需要由10火药变为20！
可驯服物种
奶酪，芝士和铝块可以在地牢和村庄发现
深沉洞穴有菌丝（不过几率变小）
之前版本各位自己翻译或者游戏体验~



制造火箭方法


完整的火箭构造


下载地址见官网下载1.8.9（目前已汉化版本）：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1bp9Nkq7较不稳定，需要各位的下载测试~






[groupid=128]HAYO Studio[/groupid]
